Source.Name: openrgb
Source.Summary: Open source RGB lighting control that doesn't depend on manufacturer software
Source.Description: An easy-to-use open source software program and library for accessing and controlling RGB lights on various PC hardware including motherboards, RAM modules, graphics cards, cooling devices, and peripherals.
